Name: help
Description: display one of several informative texts

Name: quit
Description: end the game without saving current game

Name: save
Description: save the game (to be continued later) and exit

Name: suspend
Description: suspend the game (independent of your current suspend char)

Name: whatis
Description: tell what a map symbol represents

Name: known
Description: display list of what's been discovered

Name: explore
Description: switch the game to explore (discovery) mode

Name: again
Description: redo the previous command (^A denotes the keystroke CTRL-A)

Name: prevmsg
Description: repeat previous message (subsequent ^P's repeat earlier ones)
introduces an extended command (#? for a list of them)

Name: apply
Description: apply or use a tool (pick-axe, key, camera, etc.)

Name: call
Description: name an individual monster (ex. baptize your dog)

Name: drop
Description: drop an object.  d7a:  drop seven items of object 'a'

Name: engrave
Description: write a message in the dust on the floor  (E-  use fingers)

Name: fight
Description: followed by direction, fight a monster

Name: invent
Description: list your inventory (all objects you are carrying)

Name: Invent
Description:
list selected parts of your inventory
					Iu: list unpaid objects
					Ix: list unpaid but used up items
					I$: count your money

Name: puton
Description: put on an accessory (ring, amulet, etc)

Name: search
Description: search for secret doors, hidden traps and monsters
ask for current items of specified symbol in use
ask for combination of ),[,=,",( all at once

Name: spells
Description: list the spells you know; also rearrange them if desired

Name: travel
Description: move via a shortest-path algorithm to a point on the map

Name: pickup
Description: pick up all you can carry
toggle "pickup" (auto pickup) option on and off

Name: farlook
Description: look at what is somewhere else by selecting a map symbol
list which challenges you have adhered to.
loot a box on the floor.
name an item or type of object.
offer a sacrifice to the gods.
pray to the gods for help.
rub a lamp or a stone.
list compile time options for this version of NetHack.
get this list of extended commands.
followed by number of times to repeat the next command

Name: help
Description: display one of several informative texts, like '?'

Name: loot
Description: loot a box on the floor

Name: name
Description: name an item or type of object
Display extended command help (if the platform allows this)

Name: twoweapon
Description: toggle two-weapon combat (unless number_pad is enabled)

Name: loot
Description: loot a box on the floor

Name: name
Description: name an item or type of object

Name: offer
Description: offer a sacrifice to the gods

Name: pray
Description: pray to the gods for help

Name: rub
Description: rub a lamp or a stone

Name: version
Description: print compile time options for this version
